sentence.Network_en: Footballers must learn to tackle fearlessly.
sentence.Network_cn: 橄榄球队员必须学习无所畏惧地抱住并绊倒抱球跑的对方球员.

sentence.Network_en: He gazed fearlessly at the gunman.
sentence.Network_cn: 他毫不畏惧地注视着那枪手.

sentence.Network_en: He rushed into the midst of the hooligans and laid about him fearlessly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他冲到那群恶棍中间,毫无畏惧地向四面八方乱打.

entry.def: If you say that someone is fearless, you mean that they are not afraid at all, and you admire them for this.

example.tran: 他为争取种族平等而进行的无畏斗争

sentences.sentence: "fearlessly, he led the troops into combat"

auth_sentence.content: If one thinks fearlessly one cannot be politically orthodox.
